#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int arr[55];
int main()
 {
 	int t;
 	int n;
 	int i,j;
 	int sum;
 	  cin>>t;
 	   while(t--)
 	   {
 	   	 cin>>n;
 	   	 sum=0;
 	   	 for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
 	   	   {
			   scanf("%d",arr+i);
	            sum+=arr[i];
	       }
	       //cout<<sum<<endl;
	   int a=2*sum-(n-1)*n;
	   if(a%(2*n)!=0)
	     printf("-1\n");
	   else
	     {
	     	int ctr=a/(2*n);
	     	//cout<<ctr<<endl;
	     	int ans=0;
	     	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
	     	 {
	     	 	if(arr[i]<ctr)
	     	 	 {
	     	 	    ans+=ctr-arr[i];	
			     }
			     ctr++;
			  }
	     	printf("%d\n",ans);
		 }
		}
 	return 0;
 }
